TopicTitle: Have you ever found KSP online while searching for something else?

Articles.Content:
Yesterday I was doing research on Red Cherry Shrimp, abbreviated as RCS. I Googled "2.5 RCS tank" meaning a 2.5 gallon fish tank. Bet you know what was the first search result;)

Have you ever stumbled upon a KSP-related thing while looking for something else?

Not really. I once looked up Dman979 and got this forum, but not really. If you search KSP, though you get the Kentucky State Police. And if you go to KSP.com, you arrive at Kirwan Surgical Products. (Sounds like Kerman Surgical Products, eh? I have an idea... ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T15:53:59Z" title="05/28/2015 03:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Dman979**
I actually found a lot of KSP images when I look up things related to space craft designs and other space stuff.
I found KSP because I was looking for something other than the one game I was/am obsessed with. So now I have two such games. I will never look again.
